timeline.bodyText:
Is this used? At any case, this is still a String Json. It should be optimized for gson.
Maybe you can use a JsonObject to build this String. Take a look to method NGSIUtils.linkedHashMapToJsonList.
Another solution would be creating a serializer and deserializer to indicate gson how to work with this object. take a look at NotifyContextRequestNGSIv2Deserializer.class and NotifyContextRequestNGSIv2.class. Both are used at NGSIRestHandler.class.
